title: New: Endling. – Sleeper
content:
Photo: Olivia Garner

Endling.

aka Houston’s Karina and Robbie have just released their debut self titled EP, and have made the lead track, Sleeper available to stream. Riding the middle ground between chart ready pop, and more left-field stuff like Purity Ring or Crystal Castles, even teetering on falling into more experimental trance, it builds rather beautifully throughout it’s four minutes. Stream it below, and pick the EP up here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
